alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chester; Western Chester (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New Castle and southwestern Chester Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 911 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms near Smithville, or near Willow Street, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Newark, Middletown, Elsmere, Kennett Square, New Castle, Oxford, Parkesburg, West Grove, Delaware City, Newport, Arden, Homeville, Glen Roy, Stanton, Cochranville, North Star, Glasgow, Bear and Talleyville. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
